ComicInfo.Summary:
Jughead and Vampironica now know how to set their respective realities right thanks to a most unexpected guest star-and the solution involves the very haunted history of Riverdale itself! The question is, have they bitten off more than they can chew (pun intended) as the newly arrived hordes of vampires try to end them both?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy, Bob Smith & Matt Herms | 1 | B | Cover B | Dan Panosian | 2 | C | Cover C | Matthew Taylor | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-04 12:38:08. [CVDB717623]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.Inker: Bob Smith, Joe Eisma, Joe Eisma, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Bob Smith, Dan Panosian, Matt Herms, Matthew Taylor, Pat Kennedy, Tim Kennedy
ComicInfo.Editor: Alex Segura, Jamie Lee Rotante, Stephen Oswald, Vincent Lovallo
ComicInfo.Characters: Archie Andrews, Betty Cooper, Jughead Jones, Sabrina Spellman, Veronica Lodge
